title: Craft - Minecraft Craft Guide
summary: This guide provides the recipes for crafting/brewing items in Minecraft.

description: This guide provides the recipes for crafting items in Minecraft. It is fast, simple and allows you to bookmark your most-used recipes. You can easily search through all of the items and even get the IDs of the items. This is a perfect companion app to Minecraft.Includes:. Items (with IDs, text IDs, descriptions). Biomes. Crafting, brewing and smelting for items. Mobs (including health, attack strength and spawning locations). Fast search to quickly access item recipes. Translated into many languages. Android Wear support for quick recipe accessPlease note: This is a GUIDE for the game, not the game itself.
descriptionHTML:
This guide provides the recipes for crafting items in Minecraft. It is fast, simple and allows you to bookmark your most-used recipes. You can easily search through all of the items and even get the IDs of the items. This is a perfect companion app to Minecraft.

Includes:
. Items (with IDs, text IDs, descriptions)
. Biomes
. Crafting, brewing and smelting for items
. Mobs (including health, attack strength and spawning locations)
. Fast search to quickly access item recipes
. Translated into many languages
. Android Wear support for quick recipe access

Please note: This is a GUIDE for the game, not the game itself.
comments: This is a very good app, especially if I forget a crafting recipe I turn to it. There's only one problem and that is to keep it updated. Other than that I love it! üëç
Wth this app is so awesome! The descriptions are so detail. Very helpful app.
App is great, but is missing some recipes.
